short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically parse the current page and highlight any dates found, covnerting them to your desired time zone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arr, me heartie! Behold the Auto Time Zone Calculator, a swashbucklin' package that'll make yer dates sea-worthy in the blink of a pirate's eye! This fine piece of software be crafty enough to plunder any webpage ye throw at it, spyin' on dates like a keen-eyed lookout in the crow's nest.

With the wave of its digital cutlass, this Auto Time Zone Calculator be decipherin' them dates it finds and translatin' 'em to the time zone of yer choice, so ye can navigate the treacherous seas of schedules and appointments without losin' yer way.

Picture this: ye stumble upon a treasure map online, filled with dates and times in a language ye can't quite fathom. Fear not, for this matey of a calculator will not only spot those dates but also hoist 'em up high in yer preferred time zone, clear as a cloudless sky after a storm.

No more decipherin' strange time codes or calculatin' time differences like a landlubber ‚Äì this Auto Time Zone Calculator be the trusty shipmate that takes care of it all. So, whether ye be plannin' yer next raid on the digital high seas or just tryin' to keep yer affairs shipshape, this be the tool to have in yer digital chest o' wonders!

Shiver me timbers! Let the Auto Time Zone Calculator be the wind in yer sails as ye navigate the vast ocean of dates and times on the web! Yarrr! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è‚öìÔ∏è
